name: INOVYN ChlorVinyls
membership: European Council of Vinyls Manufacturers; PlasticsEurope;  EuroChlor; PVC4Pipes; EPPA; PVC4Cables; PVC MedAlliance; ECSA; CEFIC.

euInitiatives: EU Emissions trading scheme; Circular economy; REACH; RoHS Directive; Water Framework Directive; Waste framework Directive; food contact regulations; drinking water regulations; biocides directive; Industrial emissions directive; ecolables; BEMPs.
